languages.text: "Я дарую тебе быструю смерть, если сложишь оружие".
"I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."
languages.original_text: "Я дарую тебе быструю смерть, если сложишь оружие".

traits.locale_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

"I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

languages.text: «Te concederé una muerte rápida si depones las armas».
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: «Te concederé una muerte rápida si depones las armas».

languages.text: “只要你愿意放下武器，我就可以给你个痛快。”
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: “只要你愿意放下武器，我就可以给你个痛快。”

languages.text: « Rendez les armes et je vous offrirai une mort rapide. »
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: « Rendez les armes et je vous offrirai une mort rapide. »

languages.text: 「もし武器を下ろすなら、痛めつけないで殺してやる」
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: 「もし武器を下ろすなら、痛めつけないで殺してやる」

languages.text: "Silahlarınızı bırakırsanız size hızlı bir ölüm bahşederim."
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: "Silahlarınızı bırakırsanız size hızlı bir ölüm bahşederim."

languages.text: "Ich gewähre Euch einen schnellen Tod, wenn Ihr Eure Waffen niederlagt."
languages.original_text: "I will grant you a swift death if you lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gewähre Euch einen schnellen Tod, wenn Ihr Eure Waffen niederlagt."
